name: Two planets in space
description:
A game for GMTK Game Jam 2021 

Your goal is to support a tiny space colony based on two planets. Green Planet is full of precious Wood but lacks Water, and Cold Planet is all rocky and full of Metal, but humans here need Wood to survive. Build factories, shoot asteroids, spread love, and absolutely don't mind the giant space road over there!

Features: 
* Action-packed — asteroids hit from everywhere, humans are always missing and stupid cannons don't shoot properly
* Fast pace — the whole game is 5 min long
* Multiple endings — can you survive the Final Invasion? 

Controls: 
* Space + LMB — rotate the camera
* Move humans and resources by pressing their button on the destination planet panel
* Remove humans from buildings by clicking RMB on them, and return by clicking LMB
